mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B2.* FROM gm_user_hero_equipment_wear A LEFT JOIN gm_user_equipment B ON A.GM_USER_EQUIP_ID = B.GM_USER_EQUIPMENT_ID LEFT JOIN GM_EQUIPMENT_INFO B2 ON B.GM_EQUIPMENT_ID = B2.EQUIP_ID WHERE A.STATUS = '1' AND B.STATUS = '1' AND B2.STATUS = '1' AND GM_USER_HERO_ID = #{userHeroId}
